attributes.action: Charge Manchester United for 'tapping up' Dimitar Berbatov
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Manchester United have signed Bulgaria striker Dimitar Berbatov from Tottenham in a deal worth £30.75m. 

The deal sees Fraizer Campbell going the other way on a season long loan. 

Spurs also announced they will not pursue their official complaint to the Premier League which accused United of pursuing 27-year-old Berbatov. 

Who do United think they are? They have bullied Spurs into a corner and it shouldn't be allowed. The guy was having a medical before Spurs agreed a deal with United. They moaned to high heaven when Ronaldo was tapped up and reported Real Madrid, why should they be any different! Sign this petition to get United charged

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
